original_title: Juan Downey: más allá de estos muros
overview: Renunciation, search and a constant questioning of his own roots marked the genesis of the artistic personality of Juan Downey (1940-1993), a pioneer in the use of video in the service of art. This film proposes an encounter with his life and work, through the stories of his closest collaborators and the artist himself.
title: Juan Downey: más allá de estos muros
